transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, good morning sir.
Customer: Very good morning.
Executive: Roshan baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ke office se.
Customer: Haan haan boliye sir.
Executive: Aapka app theek hua sir?
Customer: Nahi hua, nahi chala hai.
Executive: To maine na aapko ek whatsapp kara hua hai, ek bari whatsapp open kijiye.
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Net nahi chal raha kya?
Customer: Haan chala. Ji. Ye maine na aapko do link bheja hua hai.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Isme sabse pehle aapko google chrome update karna hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Uske baad android system web view ko update karna hai, right?
Customer: Google chrome update hi nahi hai.
Executive: Ek bari sir is link se kariye.
Executive: Ye dono update karne ke baad aap device ko restart kijiyega.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Ye dono cheez link pe click karne ke baad agar updated aa raha hai to uska screenshot le lijiyega.
Executive: Aur nahi aa raha hai to usko please aap update kijiyega, theek hai? Ek bar ko ye dono update ho jaye to please device jo bhi phone hai na aapko wo restart karke ek bar ko fir se login karke matlab wo aapka
Customer: Iske maine, mai, mai, maine first abhi dala to ye android system web view google LLC dikha raha hai, niche dikha raha hai remove update.
Executive: Achha update kya likha raha hai?
Customer: Remove, remove update.
Executive: Update kare usko.
Customer: Update kaise remove dikha raha hai.
Executive: Ek bari aap screenshot bhejna mujhe.
Customer: Ek second mai dusra karta hu pehle.
Executive: Pehle google chrome wale pe click karo sir aap.
Customer: Usi pe ja raha.
Executive: Zara sir update aapke.
Customer: Ek second, ek second.
(silence)
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
Customer: Please stay on the line.
Customer: Aur ye nahi dikha raha hai bhai.
Executive: Aapne link pe click kara?
Customer: Link pe nahi click kiya, ye maine sidhe sidhe chrome me dala copy karke.
Executive: Sir aapko jo maine link bheja hai us pe aapne click kiya phone pe?
Customer: Usme click nahi ho raha hai, ye maine utha ke ye mai dal raha tha.
Executive: Hmm. Chrome me. To fir kya aaya? Kya aaya?
Customer: Ek second mai wo bhi karta hu jo aapne bola na pehle mai usko karta hu usme.
Executive: Dekhiye maine fir se link bheja hai screen pe directly click kijiye.
Customer: Khali aap link bhejo haan?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ispe bhi nahi ho raha, mai isko go ye chrome me dalta hu, theek hai?
Executive: Haan, theek hai.
Customer: Ye install on more devices dikha raha hai.
Executive: Screenshot bhej do aap mere ko.
Executive: Ya ek bari play store aap open karna sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur usme google chrome dalna.
Customer: Iska screenshot bheju aapko?
Executive: Haan iska screenshot bhejiye ga ek bari.
Customer: Wo updated hi hai.
Executive: Update, update likha hua hai usme?
Customer: Na, mai bol raha hu wo updated hi hai.
Executive: Achha screenshot bhejo.
Customer: Kyu gussa hai bhai?
Customer: Aur dusra ye wala daliye.
Customer: Android web view.
Customer: Android system web view.
Customer: Konsa wala?
Executive: Android system web view, jo maine aapko dusra wala link bheja na wo dusre wale link pe ek bari click kijiye mai fir se link bhejta hu aapko.
Customer: Jo abhi bheja aapne?
Executive: Jo abhi bheja maine abhi just bheja.
Customer: Isme dikha raha hai na ye remove update.
Executive: Ek second iska screenshot bhejo aap mujhe.
Customer: Ye phone me koi problem nahi hai, ye aapke app me problem hai.
Executive: Sir wahi hum bhi check kara rahe hai sir, subah subah aap hi aapme koi problem nahi hai. Ye dekho.
Executive: Wo subah aate hi haan. Koi baat nahi.
Executive: Aap uske baad ek bari ko na abhi ek bar ko phone off karke on kijiyega.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Fir app chala ke dekhiyega nahi chale to ek bari dusra network se connect karke dekhiyega. Koi aur internet se chalaiyega jaise airtel se chala rahe honge to dusre se ek bar chala ke dekhiye. Agar nahi hota hai to please aap mujhe whatsapp kijiye.
Customer: Mujhe kya karna hai?
Executive: Sabse pehle aap mera abhi net pe chal raha hai, theek hai? Mai abhi wifi pe isko connect karunga, theek hai?
Executive: Abhi nahi isse pehle switch off switch on kar lo.
Customer: Haan haan wo bhi kar lunga, wo bhi kar lunga.
Executive: Haan, haan. Uske baad ek bari try karke dekho aap.
Executive: Ek bari mobile network se try kijiyega aur ek bari wifi se try kijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai bhai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Nahi hota to.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's IndiaMART app is not working.

- Customer unable to update app via provided links.



Resolution:

- Executive provided troubleshooting steps to update app.

- Executive suggested restarting the device.

- Executive suggested trying a different network.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try suggested troubleshooting steps.

- Customer will contact via WhatsApp if issue persists.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- app, update, troubleshooting, network
